name: Doodle Run
description:
Doodle Run is a fun and addictive game where you have to draw your way to victory.

Race against other people and at each checkpoint choose what to draw. Make sure you draw fast to have a chance at reaching the finish line first!

Become the next drawing champion with Doodle Run!

Doodle Run features:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Increasingly challenging levels
- Colorful art
